body: You feel little if any regret, and deny the event mostly so others won't judge you. Few if any know of your part in the conflict, and your constant denials are meant to keep it that way.
name: Denial (+1 CP)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 3-Moral Conflicts/Relationships/and Drawbacks/Resolution/Denial (+1 CP)
